title: About Me
description: A journey of leadership, innovation, and business transformation
heading: Hello, I'm Saurav Wadhwa
paragraphs: As the CEO and Co-Founder of Mynd Integrated Solutions Pvt. Ltd., I bring over two decades of expertise in establishing and scaling Shared Services, Process Transformation, and Automation solutions that drive business excellence.

Throughout my career, I've played a pivotal role in simplifying business complexities and empowering organizations to achieve operational excellence. My leadership journey has been focused on developing innovative automation solutions that deliver tangible results across finance and HR domains.

A strong believer that 'Leadership & Learning are indispensable to each other,' I constantly strive to evolve and bring success to every business landscape I touch. When not transforming businesses, you'll find me enjoying my passions as an avid reader and biker.
